greetings: {name} Hello there, welcome to my fanclub server! <:KouConfident:705182851754360912>
Hi! Are you Nene senpai's friend? Senpai's friend is my friend, so nice to meet you, {name}! Watch out for those apparitions, though!
{name} Don't you worry about apparitions, 'cause I, Minamoto Kou is here!
{name} So you are the guy Mitsuba was talking about!
Uhh...don't just stare me like that, {name}... <:KouShy:719349147655864400>
{name}, if Hanako gives you another scale of a mermaid, do not take it!
{name} Mitsuba might like badmouthing, but he's really nice, so I'm sure we can all be friends!
{name} Don't worry, if you have any problem, you can rely on Minamoto Kou!
random_responses: I will prove to Teru-nii that I'm right! <:KouBakaNii:712631334937296946>
failed_messages: I don't know what you are saying, but maybe you can check out the latest Blu-ray!
This must be some apparition's trick.
These commands are out of control now, where is Hanako!
I think you input it the wrong way...Not that I'm familiar with these stuffs though.
I'm not as smart as Teru-nii, so you have to give me the correct command... <:KouCry:736061517534855201>
Maybe try again? Because I don't know how to do that...
This command is not right...Something must be wrong! <:KouHeh2:712632145562304582>
cool_down: Sorry, but I still need {timeLeft} more second(s) to do the command again...I'm not like Teru-nii... <:KouCry:736061517534855201>

about.description: Shows information about the Kou bot
about.usage: Show information about the Kou bot.

comic.description: Make a simple and short Camp Buddy comic.
comic.usage: Run `comic` and upload the file at the same time to make a simple manga.

cvt.usage:
Run `cvt <target unit> <value><origin unit>` to convert `<value>` from `<origin unit>` to `<target unit>`.
Temperature units to convert to are `{temps}` from those values.
Height units to convert to are `{heights}` from those same values as well.

errors.length_too_short:
Temperature units to convert to are `{temps}` from those values.
Height units to convert to are `{heights}` from those same values as well.
The syntax is `{prefix}cvt <unit-to-convert-to> <value>`
errors.wrong_pattern: <:KouLookup:705054323473645659> I'm not sure what you mean by `{input}`...
errors.operation_not_possible: <:KouWorryBlush:705037055096389683> I don't think that's possible...Well maybe apparitions can do that.
errors.is_nan: <:KouWorryBlush:705037055096389683> I'd have to ask Hanako if that's possible...

cvt.result: <:KouBang:705054435667214367> Alright, that's the best calculation I got! {source} is {amount}{target}.

dialog.description: Returns an image of a character in Camp Buddy saying anything you want
dialog.usage:
Run `dialog <background> <character> <message>` or `dialog <character> <message>` to give you an image of a Camp Buddy character with a custom dialog!
Available backgrounds: `{backgrounds}`
Available characters: `{characters}`

errors.length_too_short: This command requires two arguments: `dialog [background] <character> <text>` ([] is optional)
errors.background_not_found:
Sorry, but I couldn't find `{background}` as a location
Available backgrounds are: `{backgrounds}`.
errors.character_not_found:
Sorry, but I don't think that `{character}` is a character in Camp Buddy
Available characters are: `{characters}`.
errors.no_message: Uh...I don't know what to send if you don't tell me anything...
errors.message_too_long: Sorry, the message limit is 180 characters for latin characters, 78 characters for Japanese <:KouCrack:705797095742767150>
errors.wrong_character_set: I can't do emotes, mentions, non-latin and non-Japanese characters
errors.cooldown: Sorry, I still have chores to do. Maybe later? <:KouWorryBlush:705037055096389683>
errors.generic: An error just happened. Must be Hanako up to something no good! <:KouAngry:705054323050020896> - {json}

emote.description: Register or deregister an emote from the bot. Note that emotes from servers which the bot is not in won't work as expected.
emote.usage: Run `emote <register|deregister>` to register or deregister an emote.

errors.length_too_short: This command requires at least a command, a name, and optionally an emote.
errors.unsupported_operation: Currently I can only register or deregister an emote.
errors.invalid_name: I'm not really good at languages...Could you pick another name, please?... <:KouConcern:736062067299188817>
errors.invalid_emote: It's not a valid emote, I think...?

image.description: Get a random image based on a keyword
image.usage: Run `image <keyword>` to get a random image. Only one keyword is permitted.

errors.length_too_short: I can try to ask Mokke to find anything for you, but you need to tell me what you want first! <:KouHehe:705054435352641587>
errors.length_too_long: Uhh...Can you be more specific? Like only one keyword at a time, please? <:KouCry:705054435826597928>
errors.no_result: Sorry...I don't understand the keyword and cannot find anything... <:KouCry:705054435826597928>
errors.generic: An error occured. Must be because of Hanako. <:KouBrave:705182851397845193> - {json}

meal.usage: Run `meal` to get a random meal recipe.

owoify.description: This command will owoify your text
owoify.usage:
Run `owoify <text>` or `owoify <intensity> <text>` to owoify any text!
Intensities available are `easy` (default), `medium`, and `hard`.

errors.length_too_short: ...I don't know what to owo, sorry...
errors.length_too_long: <:KouCry:705054435826597928> I'm not really smart so I can't owoify such a long sentence...

oracle.description: Draw an oracle and know the future of something on your mind
oracle.usage: Run `oracle` to draw an oracle and know your fortune.

pick.usage: Run `pick <option1> | <option2> | <option3>...` to let Kou pick one option for you. Run `pick <number>times <option1> | <option2> | <option3>...` to let Kou pick more than once and determine the option that is picked up most times for you.

errors.length_too_short: This command requires at least two options: `pick <option1> | <option2>...`
errors.times_too_big: Sorry I'm generally bad at math...I'd lose count if I had to count that many times.

ping.usage: Run `ping` to get the current latency.

remind.description: This command will make Kou remind you in a specific time.
remind.usage:
Run `remind in <amount> <unit> <message>` to let Kou remind you after a period of time has passed. Run `remind on <date> <message>` to let Kou remind you on 0:00AM of a specific date.
Possible units are: `{units}`.
The format for a date is: `YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY/MM/DD, YYYY.MM.DD`.

errors.length_too_short: <:KouAngry:705054323050020896> I need a specific date and time to do this...
errors.no_such_operation: Available operations/prepositions are `in <amount> <unit> <message>` and `on <date> <message>`. Available units are: `{units}`.
errors.past_time: The past is past. Even I can't go back... <:KouCry:705054435826597928>
errors.no_message: <:KouSmilingSpeechless:705037054836473936> So I should just...call you? Because you didn't tell me what to say...

remind.result: It's {time} in my place, so I will remind you on {dueTime}.

route.description: Tells you what route to play next
route.usage: Run `route` to get which route you want to play next.

hiro.description: Returns an image of Hiro saying anything you want.
hiro.usage:
Run `hirosay <background> <pose No.> <clothes> <face/expression> <message>` or `hirosay <pose No.> <clothes> <face/expression> <message>` to give you an image of Hiro with a custom dialog!
Available backgrounds: `{backgrounds}`
Run `hirosay help` to get detailed descriptions via DM.

time.usage: Run `time <city name>` to query the current local time of a city.

errors.length_too_short: This command requires a city name.

valentine.usage: Run `valentine` to get your next valentine.

infos.keitaro_header: I heard someone is super jealous about this guy, but you bet I will protect Nene senpai!
infos.keitaro_footer: Don't fret if {firstName} isn't your type. Who knows, maybe it's time for a new favorite.
infos.normal_footer: Don't fret if {firstName} isn't your type. Who knows, maybe it's time for a new favorite.
